variants.Description in input context: A point mutation at position 273 from S to C.
A point mutation at position 158 from Q to R.
A point mutation at position 189 from G to V.

Material used.Material Name: Human diploid cells treated with α-Synuclein mutations in the presence of 20S proteasome and liposomes
Material used.Description: The study was conducted using human diploid cells treated with different αSyn variants, processed by the 20S proteasome or liposomes.

Readout description.Result Description: αSyn expression was reduced by 30% for p.Y273C.
αSyn expression decreased by 40% for p.Q158R.
αSyn expression was diminished by 25% for p.G189V.

Biological replicates.Description: Three separate experiments with varying conditions were conducted.

Technical replicates.Description: No technical replicates provided in the study.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cells used as a control group.

Basic negative control.Description: Cells treated with liposomes without proteasome.

Statistical analysis method.Source: Standard statistical methods for inter-variant comparison.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Expression levels greater than 50% on day 5.
Threshold for normal readout.Source: Inferred from the study's baseline measurements.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Source: Inferred from the study's baseline measurements.
